extendedInfo.description: Selected by Mashable, the Best Mobile Game of the Year is now available on Android Market!As seen on iPhone, Super Junior SHAKE takes you to a new experience of enjoying music on Android!A proven fun entertainment by more than 2 million SHAKERS all over world!Download now and check out Super Junior's most beloved songs like "Sorry, Sorry" and "Mr. Simple!"SHAKERS! Get your thumbs ready to SHAKE!*We do not support rooted Android phones or phones using custom roms. Please return the device setting to factory default when the game does not work.**Phones with low specifications could face difficulty in playing this game.*âTap & Shake to the music!âSuper Junior SHAKE offers traditional âTAPâ style of gameplay as well as a new âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode, using a seamless-gesture technology developed by dooub. The âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode will make you feel like a DJ scratching the turntable! âIntroducing Card Deck System!âSuper Junior SHAKE rewards you cards when you complete a game. These cards can be collected, which include unreleased pictures of Super Junior, or they can be used in game like an item and receive higher scores! âWith Super JuniorâSuper Junior is one of the most loved and top selling boy band in Asia. They are the winner of twelve music awards from the Mnet Asian Music Awards, eleven from the Golden Disk Awards, and are the second singing group to win Favorite Artist Korea at the 2008 MTV Asia Awards. âImportant Notice!âWe fully support Android version 2.2 and 2.3+. We were able to successfully play on version 2.1, but it is not designed for 2.1 so there is a possibility of game not working properly. Make sure you check before making a purchase!Also, we have successfully tested and optimized our game for the following devices. If your device's hardware specification is higher than the below list, you will be able to enjoy the game smoothly. Please play the game before making a purchase!Galaxy AceGalaxy SGalaxy S2Galaxy S3Galaxy NoteGalaxy Tab 10.1HTC EvoHTC DesireHTC Sensation Z710eHTC Wildfire SLG Optimus Z SU950Motorola MB501Motorola MB860Motorola QWERTY A853Motorola XT800W GlamMotorola MB525Nexus SSKY Mirach A IM-A740SSKY Sirius IM-A600SSKY Vega IM-A650SXPERIA ArcXPERIA Mini E10iXPERIA X10iLastly, our game requires multi-touch screens. If your device is single touch, you can still enjoy the SHAKE mode and/or tap mode in Hard or below level.Hope you all enjoy!âContact UsâTwitter @MusicianSHAKE Facebook www.facebook.com/superjuniorshake

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this game! It such a entertaining a fun game! But it would be better if there\'re more than 3 songs unclocked.. but so far so good! From many Shake Games application that I\'ve installed, I love this much, cz of we can play the long play or unlocked songs. Keep it up! And I suggested there will be another Shake Games like f(x), exo, and others coming soon! ^^b
reviews.author: Adelia Baroto

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: It\'s a great game! I love Super Junior!\342\231\245 but c\'mon only 3 songs unlocked :(
reviews.author: Ashley Pasqual

reviews.title: Love it but..
reviews.comment: Great game and SJ song selection but only 2 songs unlocked at a time now and lost all my cards after the update... :(

reviews.title: UNABLE TO PLAY IT
reviews.comment: i cant open it after i hv changed my phone. Pls fix.

reviews.title: Could use work
reviews.comment: This game is amazing and lots of fun to play,  though sometimes it crashes half way through songs and when it updated I lost half of the songs that had bought. It\'s a little frustrating.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: It is amazing I love it :3 but it would be fin if there was more songs unlocked, also can u plz make a shinee shake :D ill be so happy if u do.

reviews.title: Request shake!
reviews.comment: I love this game a lot even tho they only unlock three songs but im still very pleased with this app. i wonder what happened to the girls generation shake tho (it was my favorite). I REALLY WANT AN EXO SHAKE TOO! if you make an EXO shake then imma download all the kpop shakes and give them all 5 stars!!! so please make an EXO shake and bring the girls generation shake back!!!!

The other prob is when i click on play it takes a looong time then it goes to the menu :\'( what\'s wrong with my shake i uninstalled and installed it many times nd same prob pllzz guys fix it i really addicted to SJ shake so plz fix it faaastly . Thnk u <3

reviews.title: Can\'t reinstall
reviews.comment: I really love this app. But one day after I reset my phone storage and wanna reinstall it, it couldnt be installed. Hope it will be fixed..

reviews.title: Love the game
reviews.comment: The game is very fun to play its addicting especially if youre into k-pop but if you can can you make more free songs than just 3. I love all the games but can you please make a SHINee and B.a.p shake? Thx :)
reviews.author: Tristan Reece

reviews.title: Best!!
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t ask for more. All the songs I\'ve bought now has returned and the game has been functioning normally. Thank you very much for the great and fast update, looking forward to see another version of Shake. Would be great to have SHINee Shake soon though!
reviews.author: A Google User
